import data from "../data/data"; import React, { useState } from "react"; function ProductView(props) { const [model, setModel] = useState([]); const selectedProduct = data.productData.find((i) => i.Id === 1); return (

{selectedProduct.name}



{/* Ürün Kodu: {selectedProduct.code}



Adet Fiyatı: {selectedProduct.lastPrice} TL



İndirimli Adet Fiyatı: {selectedProduct.price} TL */}


); } export default ProductView;
